bodydiv.p: This Basis for Conclusions summarises the International Accounting Standards Board’s considerations in reaching its conclusions on amending IAS 41 Agriculture, including by issuing Agriculture: Bearer Plants (Amendments to IAS 16 and IAS 41) in June 2014. Individual Board members gave greater weight to some factors than to others.
